rooms.description: An inviting entrance with a foyer area. It aligns with Vastu by placing the main entrance facing North or East to ensure positive energy flow.

A Mediterranean styled combined space that includes the kitchen and living area. The design features an open-plan layout with ample natural light from East and North exposures, in compliance with Vastu principles.
A small dedicated dining area adjacent to the open-plan kitchen and living space. Designed with Mediterranean accents, ensuring a balanced energy flow.
A quiet, well-lit library space that adheres to Vastu by being located in the North-West zone of the apartment. It provides a calm retreat area.
A guest bedroom with Mediterranean decor that is Vastu-compliant by being placed in a stable corner of the floor plan.
A spacious master bedroom with an en-suite bathroom. The room is oriented towards positive energies by positioning it in the Southwest quadrant.
A private bathroom attached to the master bedroom ensuring privacy and comfort. Designed with modern fixtures.
A dedicated study space that is Vastu-compliant by ensuring a clear view of the North and East, promoting productivity.
A utility room for domestic helpers with appropriate storage spaces. It is positioned to avoid disturbing the main living spaces.

openings.description: The primary door facing North to maximize auspicious energy as per Vastu and Mediterranean aesthetics.
Large windows installed on the East and North facades to invite natural light and enhance ventilation, while adhering to Vastu guidelines.
An open balcony adjacent to the living area that provides an outdoor extension of the Mediterranean style interior, positioned optimally for sunlight.
A secondary entrance designed for service purposes that minimizes disturbance to the main living areas and is Vastu-compliant by avoiding West exposure.
